price: 47. No pienses (¡oh, Muhammad!) que Al-lah incumplirá Su promesa con los mensajeros (de concederles la victoria y derrotar a quienes niegan la verdad), pues Él es Poderoso, capaz de castigar duramente (a quienes lo desobedecen).
arabic: فَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِفَ وَعۡدِهِۦ رُسُلَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٞ ذُو ٱنتِقَامٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: falā taḥsabanna al-laha mukh'lifa waʿdihi rusulahu inna al-laha ʿazīzun dhū intiqāmin
